name: 绯月论坛
introduction:
Galgame资源搜索,可以搜索一些游戏资源
**注意:
需要论坛货币KFB才能下载资源
不建议使用
******
request: https://bbs.kforz.com/search.php@post->step=2&method=AND&sch_area=0&s_type=forum&f_fid=all&orderway=lastpost&asc=DESC&keyword={key}&pwuser=&submit=%C8%AB%D5%BE%CB%D1%CB%F7@charset->gbk@header->Content-Type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=UTF-8@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/86.0.4240.111 Safari/537.36

search.list: function Main(html){return jsoups(html,'div > table > tbody > tr');}
search.title: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'td:nth-child(1) > a');}
search.url: function Main(text){return jsoup(text,'td:nth-child(1) > a@attr->href')+'@header->Content-Type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=UTF-8@header->user-agent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 4.4.2; Nexus 4 Build/KOT49H) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/81.0.4044.138 Mobile Safari/537.36';}
